briefdescription.para: ESP32-specific WiFi power save mode mapping.
Maximum number of WiFi scan results.
ESP32 WiFi type definitions for hardware abstraction.

detaileddescription.para: This header defines the ESP32-specific types, constants, and utility functions for WiFi operations. It provides a clean interface between the generic WiFi base class and ESP-IDF specific implementations.

simplesect.para: This file should be included by ESP32 WiFi implementation files.
All definitions are specific to ESP32 with ESP-IDF v5.5+.
